amendment.description: Amendment to redirect $10 million in funding regarding for "Grants-in-Aid for Airports" administered by the Federal Aviation Administration for the Department of Transportation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $10 million in funding regarding for "Grants-in-Aid for Airports" administered by the Federal Aviation Administration for the Department of Transportation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
